trans-unit.source: Represents the collection that contains the indexes to the selected items in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件中选定项的索引的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> stores the indexes to the selected items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>存储中的选定项的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The indexes stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> are index positions within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 中存储的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>是内的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> stores all items displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>存储中显示的所有项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows an example of how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> stores the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and shows their selection states in an example <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示如何的示例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>中存储的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>并在示例中显示其所选内容状态<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Item
trans-unit.target: 项

trans-unit.source: Selection state in the ListView
trans-unit.target: 列表视图中的选定状态

trans-unit.source: Item1
trans-unit.target: item1

trans-unit.source: Unselected
trans-unit.target: 未选定

trans-unit.source: Item2
trans-unit.target: Item2

trans-unit.source: Selected
trans-unit.target: 已选定

trans-unit.source: Item3
trans-unit.target: Item3

trans-unit.source: Unselected
trans-unit.target: 未选定

trans-unit.source: Item4
trans-unit.target: Item4

trans-unit.source: Selected
trans-unit.target: 已选定

trans-unit.source: Item5
trans-unit.target: Item5

trans-unit.source: Selected
trans-unit.target: 已选定

trans-unit.source: Based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> would appear.
trans-unit.target: 基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>上表中的示例中下, 表说明了如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>将出现。

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: 索引

trans-unit.source: Index of selected item in the ListViewItemCollection
trans-unit.target: ListViewItemCollection 中的选定项的索引

trans-unit.source: You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用的属性和方法的此类来执行各种任务的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether an index position from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> is one of the indexes stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Contains%2A>方法使您能够确定是否从索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>是存储在索引之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the position of the index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您知道该项目集合中，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定中的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A> members and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.HeaderStyle%2A>成员和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> object named `ListView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `TextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>对象名为`ListView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名为`TextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 调用`InitializeListView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the event handler is correctly associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要该事件处理程序与正确关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control that owns the collection.
trans-unit.target: 拥有该集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 你无法创建此类的实例，而无需将其与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> collection to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 集合中的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Adds the item at the specified index in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> array to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> 数组中指定索引处的项添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 中的项数。

trans-unit.source: This method will return 0 if the handle has not been created for the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将返回 0，如果尚未为拥有创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: (You can determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> has an associated handle by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.) This method will return -1 if the handle has not been created for a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: (你可以确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>有一个关联的句柄通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。)此方法将返回-1，如果不为虚拟机创建了句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of items in the owner <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小于 0，或者大于等于所有者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的项数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The owner <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is in virtual mode, and the specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 处于虚拟模式下，而指定的索引小于 0，或者大于等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to clear all the selected items.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法以清除所有选定的项目。

trans-unit.source: The index to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的索引。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified index is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定索引是否位于集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is an item in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的指定索引是集合中的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether an index position from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> is one of the selected indexes stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Contains%2A>方法使您能够确定是否从索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>是某一存储在所选索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Once you know that an item is in the selected index collection, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the position of the index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你知道某个项是在所选的索引集合中，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定中的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> representing the array to copy the contents of the collection to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Array" />，表示要将该集合的内容复制到的数组。

trans-unit.source: The location within the destination array to copy the items from the collection to.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的项将复制到的目标数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.
trans-unit.target: 将整个集合复制到现有数组中，从该数组内的指定位置开始复制。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于合并到单个阵列中的多个集合中所选的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的项数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够确定中选定项的数目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.
trans-unit.target: 然后，循环访问集合的值和需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数时，可以使用此值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is set to `false`, this property returns a value of either 0 or 1 depending on whether an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>设置为`false`，此属性返回值为 0 或 1，具体取决于是否选择了某个项。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the selected index collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于循环访问选定索引集合的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that represents the selected index collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示选定的索引集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中查找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 中从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> of the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 中返回指定索引的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 内的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the collection where the specified index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> is located within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />, or -1 if the index is not located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 的指定索引在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 内所在的集合中的索引（索引从零开始计算）；如果索引不在该集合中则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: Once you know that an item is in the selected index collection (using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Contains%2A> method), you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the position of the index in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你知道某个项是在所选的索引集合中 (使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Contains%2A>方法)，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法来确定中的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该集合为只读，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is always `true` for this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终是`true`为此集合。

trans-unit.source: The items in the collection can be modified only by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 可以仅通过修改集合中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the collection to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的项在集合中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index value at the specified index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中指定索引处的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The index value from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> that is stored at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 存储在指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 中的索引值。

trans-unit.source: This indexer enables you to get a specific selected index from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 此索引器使你能够获取的特定的所选的索引，从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The index stored in the collection is an index into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that represents a selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 集合中存储的索引是元素的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>表示中的选定的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 0，或者大于或等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Count" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> collection to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> 内移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 集合中的项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item at the specified index in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> collection from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items" /> 中移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 集合中指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the handle for the owner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> has not been created (you can check this using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property), calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Remove%2A> method will have no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>位于虚拟模式，并且所有者的句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>尚未创建 (你可以检查这使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性)，则调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection.Remove%2A>方法不会有影响<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the number of items in the owner <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引小于 0，或者大于等于所有者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的项数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The owner <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is in virtual mode, and the specified index is less than 0 or greater than or equal to the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 所有者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 处于虚拟模式下，而指定的索引小于 0，或者大于等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualListSize" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示对集合的访问是否为同步的（线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步控件集合访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object used to synchronize the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于同步集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object to be added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加一项。

trans-unit.source: The location of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 所添加项的位置。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 无法更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>类直接。

trans-unit.source: To add the index of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除所有项。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 无法更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>类直接。

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property to `false` for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>属性`false`每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发。

trans-unit.source: The index to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的索引。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified item is located in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定项是否位于集合内。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is an item in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的指定索引是集合中的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中查找的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 中从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 中的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> contains the indexes of selected items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的选定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which <c>value</c> should be inserted..
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，应在该位置插入 <c>value</c>。

trans-unit.source: The object to be inserted into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将某个项插入到集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 无法更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>类直接。

trans-unit.source: To add the index of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The index value from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> that is stored at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 存储在指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection" /> 中的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection" /> 中删除的对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定项的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 无法更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>类直接。

trans-unit.source: To remove an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除中的一个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合中指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 无法更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>类直接。

trans-unit.source: To remove an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除中的一个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndexCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
trans-unit.target: 始终引发。
